General.Name: Perception Capital Corp II Unit
General.Description: Perception Capital Corp. II does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the technology-enabled sector. Perception Capital Corp. II was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Wayzata, Minnesota. Perception Capital Corp. II is a subsidiary of Perception Capital Partners II LLC.
General.Address: 315 Lake Street East, Wayzata, MN, United States, 55391
